body:
What kinds of such uses do you foresee? My inclination is to cut down on layers of abstraction where the value isn't clear. In this case, my understanding is that `TFBool.T` is meant to be fed into methods that require a `Class<TFBool>` parameter. Wouldn't that imply that the class object must be the representative of the type? 

Or am I missing something?
